title: Un Homme Qui Dort = a Man Who Sleeps
brief_description:
A student refuses to carry on with his studies and decides to live ‘in neutral time’ or at the limit of schizophrenia. Reference: Film Index International.

Credits: Director, Bernard Queysanne ; writers, Bernard Queysanne, Georges Perec ; photography, Bernard Zitzermann ; music, Philippe Drogoz, Eugenie Kuffler.
Cast: Jacques Spiesser, Ludmila Mikael.
